com.buession.jdbc.datasource.config

接口 PoolConfiguration

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractPoolConfiguration, Dbcp2PoolConfiguration, DruidPoolConfiguration, GenericPoolConfiguration, HikariPoolConfiguration, TomcatPoolConfiguration

    public interface PoolConfiguration
    连接池配置
    从以下版本开始:
    1.3.2
    作者:
    Yong.Teng
